ValidationRule.description: This will prevent a user from moving the stage of a Deal backwards
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name == 'System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name == 'Origination Manager'), CASE(StageName, "Initial Review",1, "Data Tape Recevied",2, "Term Sheet Issued",3, "Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected",4, 0) < CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Initial Review",1, "Data Tape Recevied",2, "Term Sheet Issued",3, "Term Sheet Signed/Deposit Collected",4, 0))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Stage of the Deal cannot be moved backwards. If this is a special case, please request this through your manager or Salesforce Administrator
